Atlanta.Knight Park\u2013Howell Station: Knight Park–Howell Station, also known as Howell Station Historic District or Knight Park Historic District, is a National historic district and neighborhood in, Atlanta, Georgia. Almost all buildings in the area were destroyed in the American Civil War, in Sherman's March to the Sea, and all of the buildings in the district were built after 1864. The neighborhood was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1997.
